rules_text:
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever Scavengermobile deals combat damage to a player, choose land or nonland, then rediscover a card of that kind. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's a card of the chosen type. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)[/i]
